author: watson-ij
body:
#### PR description:

Preemptive backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29194 into 11_0_X, fix for gem in run3 crashing due to not reading the emap from the db.

title: Update Run3 GEM to use the eMap from the DB
